about.title: About me
about.text:
Technical Telecommunications Engineer with over 15 years of experience as a Web Developer and 5 years as a Front-End Developer. Having acquired the understanding of projects from perspectives of both: the business and customer. Feeling confortable working with Agile Methodologies like Scrum or Kanban.
Iâ€™m a natural problem-solver, honest, hard-working and self-motivated. Passionate about my work and committed to helping the team improve, focused in 'good practices' and 'clean code'.
I'm currently developing aside projects with React.

tools.text: These are my current tools, some are everyday tools and others are a little old fashioned, but all then are useful.
